local_intent: Detect and align to the bread, compute pinch grasp, execute Pick(grasp_bread), and verify stable grasp.
assumptions: Bread is visible and reachable at pregrasp height
Computed grasp pose is valid for a pinch grasp
coherence_with_global: Replicates GLOBAL_BT grasp phase with same targets and parameters and adds a bounded retry on grasp computation and pick, ending with IsGraspStable.
